summary: In 1862, a young Englishwoman becomes royal tutor in Siam and befriends the King.
cast: Irene Dunne|Rex Harrison|Linda Darnell|Lee J. Cobb|Gale Sondergaard|Mikhail Rasumny|Dennis Hoey|Tito Renaldo|Richard Lyon|John Abbott|Aristophanes|Victor Bach|Cha Bing|Jan Bryant|Chabing|Oie Chan|Si-Lan Chen|Maxine Chevelier|Dorothy Chung|Buff Cobb|Evelyne de Luzuriaga|Rico De Montez|Jack Deery|Rosa Del Rosario|Blacky Dittars|Marjorie Eaton|William Edmunds|Sandra Foloway|Joe Garcio|Helena Grant|Ted Hecht|Aram Katcher|Connie Leon|Sydney Logan|Laurette Luez|Stanley Mann|Cissy Marr|Cecilia Meagher|Luisita Mendoza|Lillian Molieri|Harry Monty|Neyle Morrow|Miguel Padilla|Marianne Quon|Toni Raimando|Pedro Regas|Addison Richards|Julian Rivero|Yvonne Rob|Constantine Romanoff|Mickey Roth|Hazel Shon|Leonard Strong|Diane Van der Ecker|Saturnino Villanueva|Chet Voravan|Ben Welden|Jean Wong
title: Ana y el rey de Siam
